name: js-assignment-chooserandom
author: Will Marttala <wmarttala123@gmail.com>
description: Students are to implement the ```chooseRandom``` function from the skeleton provided in ```lib.js```. This function takes an ```array``` and the number of random items to choose from the array (```numItems```). It should return a new array containing the correct number of randomly selected, unique items from the original array.
